text: Hi <@U03FJQPSC0Y>, I had shared this with Mark via email also, basically if I create or upload a project with a forward slash in the project name, it returns a 404 error and I am not able to access the project anymore. It gets stuck probably due to lack of URL encoding. This leaves 2 of my projects inaccessible, whereas I would like to delete them.

Another bug / hard to understand feature is with automated GitHub builds. If I upload the project manually with the HS CLI, the build works perfectly fine, but if I use the GitHub automated build it immediately throws an error and shows an endless loading screen in the build details. Same exact setup for either option, one works the other doesn't. I would expect an error message telling me what went wrong with the GitHub deploy so I can fix it :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi <@U044BTK3EGP>, thanks for raising and I can followup with our development team. I am PM for projects so I would love to continue get your feedback either in this channel or directly if you prefer.

LinkedIn Sales Navigator is built differently for Marketplace by HubSpot team. The new UI extensions are not yet available for public apps. 

We are purposefully not allowing iframes right inside the page to keep the experience seamless for end users. You can always show iframe in a modal though.

Can you tell me what are you looking to iframe? And why do you want to use an iframe?
